user_query: reach Earth. Gravity actually distorts spacetime, and we've done a lot of experiments that support general relativity. And we've always confirmed that relativity was right. In the movie, there is a scene that kindly explains general relativity. It's the conversation between Cooper and Little Murph. Cooper says if he goes at the speed of light or approaches an object that has enormous gravity like a black hole, time will be slower than Murph. Cooper tells Brand that he didn't teach his daughter the theory of relativity, but in fact, one sentence contains the core of Einstein's theories of special and general relativity. Please check out the two relativity theories in the following video, now just remember that, as Cooper said, the greater the gravity, the more spacetime is distorted, and the slower the time is. Can't you see the extreme distortion of spacetime with your own eyes? I'm sure all of you who watched the movie know the answer. It's a black hole. When a star with a very heavy mass burns up all its fuel, it cannot overcome its own gravity and starts to contract inside. And the final crushing blow is done. Eventually, the enormous remaining mass literally unites into a single point, and the time and space are extremely distorted. After this process, time and space are distorted by the warping energy of the space itself. Because mass is equivalent to energy. This is how a black hole is created. A Black hole made like this leaves only two very simple elements of mass

entities.entity_description: Gravity는 영화로 언급되며, 시공간 왜곡과 일반 상대성 이론을 다루는 내용과 관련된다
Cooper는 영화의 등장인물로, 빛의 속도로 이동하거나 블랙홀 같은 거대한 중력을 가진 물체에 접근하면 시간이 느려진다고 설명하는 인물이다
Little Murph는 Cooper의 딸로, Cooper가 일반 상대성 이론을 설명해주는 대화 상대이다
Brand는 Cooper가 딸에게 상대성 이론을 가르치지 않았다고 말하는 대화 상대이다
Einstein은 특수 상대성 이론과 일반 상대성 이론을 정립한 과학자로, 영화에서 그의 이론이 핵심적으로 다뤄진다

relationships.relationship_description: Cooper는 Murph의 아버지이며, 일반 상대성 이론을 설명해주는 장면이 있다
Cooper는 Brand에게 딸에게 상대성 이론을 가르치지 않았다고 말한다
Cooper는 영화에서 일반 상대성 이론을 친절하게 설명하는 장면에 등장하는 인물이다
Murph는 영화에서 Cooper와 일반 상대성 이론에 대해 대화하는 장면에 등장한다
